com.betfair.cougar.api.security

Interface IdentityResolver


  • public interface IdentityResolver
    The IdentityResolver resolves a set of credentials into an IdentityChain.
    See Also:
    IdentityChain

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resolve(IdentityChain chain, ExecutionContextWithTokens ctx)
      Given a set of credentials, resolves those credentials into an IdentityChain.
      List<IdentityToken> tokenise(IdentityChain chain)
      Given an identity chain, resolve back into a set of writable tokens

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        void resolve(IdentityChain chain,
           ExecutionContextWithTokens ctx)
             throws InvalidCredentialsException
        Given a set of credentials, resolves those credentials into an IdentityChain. The identity chain to add the result(s) to is passed in.
        Parameters:
        chain - the identity chain to add resolved identities to
        ctx - the execution context resolved so far including identity tokens resolved by the IdentityTokenResolver (IdentityChain on this context will be null).
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException

      • tokenise

        List<IdentityToken> tokenise(IdentityChain chain)
        Given an identity chain, resolve back into a set of writable tokens
        Parameters:
        chain - an identity chain
        Returns:
        a list of tokens that may be written, which may be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException
